title: Black N’ Blue Productions Presents BURN @ Santos Party House
desc: After one of the Hardcore scene?s most highly-anticipated returns to the stage, followed by a legendary set at the Black N? Blue Bowl in May, we are beyond excited to have BURN back on? Sunday, December 20th ?at Santos Party House in New York City with support from Baltimore?s MINDSET (playing their final show in NYC before disbanding), WISDOM IN CHAINS, KING NINE, THE WILDING INCIDENT (feat. members of Crown Of Thornz + Maximum Penalty) , REGULATE, ACTIVATOR and Staten Island?s newest addition IMPACT.? - This is strictly a 16+ event with valid ID - No refunds will be offered unless event is canceled. - Coat check is availible and mandatory in cold weather.
